label: 慶滋保胤
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (?931-1002). Disciple of Sugawara no Fumitoki. Compositions in in Honchō monzui (19). Wrote Chitei ki 池亭記 (982). Kanshi in Wakan rōeishū 和漢朗詠集 (17), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (16), and Sakumon daitai (3). [菅原文時、本朝文粋、漢詩、作文大体]
